==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Fidelin is part of the Beret Society. He is one of [[Dougier]]'s subordinates. He can be found in the domain [[Dougier's "Kingdom"]] along with [[Deparis]] and others as spectators in the crowd to Dougier's speech.
